name: Crazy Boy
description:
Crazy Boy 1.0 is a 2D platform Unlimited Runner Game, It is very interesting game but simple logic and graphics! We develop the game as a test maybe update in future, please tell us a comment and advice that How we Improve the game.

Enjoy!

Please give me a donation for better Studio and Games! Though Its a free games but Your donation can help us to fulfill your needs!
